name: SNOWFALL (acronaut)
description:
Game: SNOWFALL v.0.0.1a  Theme: "What is Hidden in Snow Comes Forth in the Thaw" Story:  "What is Hidden in Code Shall Melt the Frozen Machine.." "An ancient fractilian creature ascended to surface world from the deep" (An Unidentifed Frozen Object that appears to be a Starfish that believes it is a Snowflake) Controls:

Control the Creature with Mouse & Keyboard (W/S/A/D) - Steering.. 

Left-Shift - Hold for Thrust!

NOTE: 

Project Budget Based on Visual Assets: 7.83 Gb (4k and 8k Textures) 3.53 Gb (4k Textures) 2.50 Gb (4k Textures and Optimized Project) 775 mb (2k Textures, bug fixes and more Optimized Project)

Extensive Use of Megascans by Quixel:
